description: This file defines the DaytonaTools class, a toolkit for remote code execution using the Daytona SDK. It manages sandbox creation, configuration, and code execution methods, including handling Python code specifically.

classes.name: DaytonaTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing Daytona sandbox environments and executing code within them.

methods.name: run_python_code
methods.description: Prepares and executes Python code in the Daytona sandbox, returning the result or error message.

methods.name: run_code
methods.description: Executes non-Python code in the Daytona sandbox, returning the result or error message.
